description:
This extension adds a parallax effect to the sprite.
This is not Fake 3D. Images cannot be skewed.
name: ParallaxSprite
shortDescription: This extension adds a parallax effect to the sprite.

eventsFunctions.description:
Running this event ensures that the extension is properly included in the project.
Improvements to GDevelop in the future may eliminate the need to do this.
eventsFunctions.name: LoadParallaxExtension

events.comment:
Running this event ensures that the extension is properly included in the project.
Improvements to GDevelop in the future may eliminate the need to do this.

eventsFunctions.description:
Returns the direction vector from A to B.
Sets the vector ([x,y,z]) to the specified scene variable.
eventsFunctions.name: DirectionVector
eventsFunctions.sentence: Vector To Point From (_PARAM1_ , _PARAM2_ , _PARAM3_) To (_PARAM4_ , _PARAM5_ , _PARAM6_) in _PARAM7_

events.comment: If the point is behind the camera, an approximation is returned. This is not an exact value.
